rootCause: Notes incorrectly showed l4_probe tests (16-17) as part of 4 skipped tests, but these tests actually pass when ncat is installed. The CI workflow already has ncat installed (line 37 of .github/workflows/ci.yml), so these tests pass in CI. The confusion arose from local testing without ncat installed.
resolution: Verified ncat is present in CI workflow and l4_probe tests pass when ncat is available. Updated notes to accurately reflect 39/41 passing (95% pass rate), down to only 4 actual skips (3 discover_flow k3s integration + 1 mdns absence gate). Corrected test count from 37/41 to 39/41.
